name: Reuniclus
author: Masakazu Fukuda
flavor_text: While it could use its psychic abilities in battle, this Pokémon prefers to swing its powerful arms around to beat opponents into submission.

abilities.name: Persistent Cells
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from an attack from your opponent’s Pokémon, put it into your hand instead of the discard pile. (Discard all attached cards.)

attacks.name: Cell Fork
attacks.effect: Choose 2 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon and put 3 damage counters on each of them.
